00021 IniReader::IniReader(const std::string& filename, KeywordList& keywords) : m_filename(filename), m_keywords(keywords) {
00022  if (IniReader::DefaultKeywords.empty())  {
00023   (IniReader::DefaultKeywords)["true"] = true;
00024   (IniReader::DefaultKeywords)["false"] = false;
00025  }
00026 }

00028 IniReader::~IniReader() {}

00030 bool IniReader::Parse() {
00031  FILE* f = OpenGameFile(m_filename, "r");
00032  if(f == NULL)
00033   return false;
00034 
00035  bool res = true;
00036  enum ParseState {
00037   S_DEFAULT, S_IGNORERESTLINE, S_PROPNAME, S_PROPVALUE, S_SECTION };
00038  ParseState state = S_DEFAULT;
00039  std::string propname;
00040  std::string section;
00041  std::string value;
00042 
00043  while(!feof(f) && !ferror(f)) {
00044   unsigned char c = 0;
00045   if(fread(&c, 1, 1, f) == 0) break;
00046 
00047   if(c == '\r') continue; // ignore this
00048 
00049   switch(state) {
00050   case S_DEFAULT:
00051    if(c >= 128) break; // just ignore unicode-stuff when we are in this state (UTF8 bytes at beginning are also handled by this)
00052    else if(isspace(c)) break; // ignore spaces and newlines
00053    else if(c == '#') { state = S_IGNORERESTLINE; /* this is a comment */ break; }
00054    else if(c == '[') { state = S_SECTION; section = ""; break; }
00055    else if(c == '=') {
00056     warnings << "WARNING: \"=\" is not allowed as the first character in a line of " << m_filename << endl;
00057     break; /* ignore */ }
00058    else { state = S_PROPNAME; propname = c; break; }
00059 
00060   case S_SECTION:
00061    if(c == ']') {
00062     if( ! OnNewSection(section) )  { res = false; goto parseCleanup; }
00063     state = S_DEFAULT; NewSection(section); break; }
00064    else if(c == '\n') {
00065     warnings << "WARNING: section-name \"" << section << "\" of " << m_filename << " is not closed correctly" << endl;
00066     state = S_DEFAULT; break; }
00067    else if(isspace(c)) {
00068     warnings << "WARNING: section-name \"" << section << "\" of " << m_filename << " contains a space" << endl;
00069     break; /* ignore */ }
00070    else { section += c; break; }
00071 
00072   case S_PROPNAME:
00073    if(c == '\n') {
00074     warnings << "WARNING: property \"" << propname << "\" of " << m_filename << " incomplete" << endl;
00075     state = S_DEFAULT; break; }
00076    else if(isspace(c)) break; // just ignore spaces
00077    else if(c == '=') { state = S_PROPVALUE; value = ""; break; }
00078    else { propname += c; break; }
00079 
00080   case S_PROPVALUE:
00081    if(c == '\n' || c == '#') {
00082     if( ! OnEntry(section, propname, value) ) { res = false; goto parseCleanup; }
00083     NewEntryInSection(propname, value);
00084     if(c == '#') state = S_IGNORERESTLINE; else state = S_DEFAULT;
00085     break; }
00086    else if(isspace(c) && value == "") break; // ignore heading spaces
00087    else { value += c; break; }
00088 
00089   case S_IGNORERESTLINE:
00090    if(c == '\n') state = S_DEFAULT;
00091    break; // ignore everything
00092   }
00093  }
00094 
00095  // In case the endline is missing at the end of file, finish the parsing of the last line
00096  if (state == S_PROPVALUE)  {
00097   if( ! OnEntry(section, propname, value) ) { res = false; goto parseCleanup; }
00098   NewEntryInSection(propname, value);
00099  }
00100 
00101  // DEBUG: dump the file
00102  /*notes << "Dump of " << m_filename << endl;
00103  for (SectionMap::iterator it = m_sections.begin(); it != m_sections.end(); ++it)  {
00104   notes << "[" << it->first << "]" << endl;
00105   for (Section::iterator k = it->second.begin(); k != it->second.end(); ++k)
00106    notes << k->first << "=" << k->second << endl;
00107   notes << endl;
00108  }
00109  notes << endl;*/
00110 
00111 parseCleanup:
00112  fclose(f);
00113 
00114  return res;
00115 }
00116 
00117 void IniReader::NewSection(const std::string& name)
00118 {
00119  m_curSection = &m_sections[name];
00120 }
00121 
00122 void IniReader::NewEntryInSection(const std::string& name, const std::string& value)
00123 {
00124  if (!m_curSection)  {
00125   warnings << "Cannot add item " << name << " to any section, because the current section is unset" << endl;
00126   return;
00127  }
00128 
00129  (*m_curSection)[name] = value;
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool IniReader::GetString(const std::string& section, const std::string& key, std::string& string) const
00133 {
00134  // Get the section
00135  SectionMap::const_iterator sect = m_sections.find(section);
00136  if (sect == m_sections.end())
00137   return false;
00138 
00139  // Get the key=value pair
00140  Section::const_iterator item = sect->second.find(key);
00141  if (item == sect->second.end())
00142   return false;
00143 
00144  string = item->second;
00145  return true;
00146 }
00147 
00148 bool IniReader::ReadString(const std::string& section, const std::string& key, std::string& value, std::string defaultv) const
00149 {
00150  bool res = GetString(section, key, value);
00151  if (!res)
00152   value = defaultv;
00153  return res;
00154 }

00156 bool IniReader::ReadInteger(const std::string& section, const std::string& key, int *value, int defaultv) const
00157 {
00158  std::string string;
00159 
00160  *value = defaultv;
00161 
00162  if(!GetString(section, key, string))
00163   return false;
00164 
00165  *value = from_string<int>(string);
00166 
00167  return true;
00168 }

00170 bool IniReader::ReadFloat(const std::string &section, const std::string &key, float *value, float defaultv) const
00171 {
00172  std::string string;
00173 
00174  *value = defaultv;
00175 
00176  if(!GetString(section, key, string))
00177   return false;
00178 
00179  *value = (float)atof(string);
00180 
00181  return true;
00182 }

00184 bool IniReader::ReadColour(const std::string &section, const std::string &key, Color &value, const Color &defaultv) const
00185 {
00186  std::string string;
00187 
00188  value = defaultv;
00189 
00190  if(!GetString(section, key, string))
00191   return false;
00192 
00193  value = StrToCol(string);
00194 
00195  return true;
00196 }

00198 bool IniReader::ReadIntArray(const std::string &section, const std::string &key, int *array, int num_items) const
00199 {
00200  std::string string;
00201 
00202  if (!GetString(section, key, string))
00203   return false;
00204 
00205  std::vector<std::string> arr = explode(string,",");
00206  for (int i=0; i < MIN(num_items,(int)arr.size()); i++)  {
00207   TrimSpaces(arr[i]);
00208   array[i] = from_string<int>(arr[i]);
00209  }
00210 
00211  return num_items == (int)arr.size();
00212 }
00213 
00214 bool IniReader::ReadKeyword(const std::string &section, const std::string &key, int *value, int defaultv) const
00215 {
00216  std::string string;
00217 
00218  *value = defaultv;
00219 
00220  if(!GetString(section, key, string))
00221   return false;
00222 
00223  // Try and find a keyword with matching keys
00224  KeywordList::const_iterator f = m_keywords.find(string);
00225  if(f != m_keywords.end()) {
00226   //notes << filename << ":" << section << "." << key << ": " << f->first << "(" << string << ") = " << f->second << endl;
00227   *value = f->second;
00228   return true;
00229  }
00230 
00231  warnings << m_filename << ":" << section << "." << key << ": '" << string << "' is an unknown keyword" << endl;
00232 
00233  return false;
00234 }
00235 
00236 bool IniReader::ReadKeyword(const std::string &section, const std::string &key, bool *value, bool defaultv) const
00237 {
00238  int v = defaultv ? 1 : 0;
00239  bool ret = ReadKeyword(section, key, &v, defaultv ? 1 : 0);
00240  *value = v != 0;
00241  return ret;
00242 }
00243 
00244 bool IniReader::ReadKeywordList(const std::string &section, const std::string &key, int *value, int defaultv) const
00245 {
00246  std::string string;
00247 
00248  *value = defaultv;
00249 
00250  if (!GetString(section, key, string))
00251   return false;
00252 
00253  std::vector<std::string> split = explode(string, ",");
00254  for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator it = split.begin(); it != split.end(); it++)  {
00255   TrimSpaces(*it);
00256   KeywordList::const_iterator key = m_keywords.find(*it);
00257   if (key != m_keywords.end())
00258    *value |= key->second;
00259  }
00260 
00261  return true;
00262 }
